titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore and increase tax deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions governing the income tax deduction for the health insurance costs of self-employed individuals to: (1) make the deduction permanent; and (2) phase in an increase in the allowable deduction, reaching 100 percent for taxable years beginning in 1998 and thereafter.
